00009 module global
00010 
00011   use materials, only: material_type
00012   use particle,  only: particle_type
00013   use tally,     only: tally_type
00014   use timing,    only: Timer
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017   save
00018 
00019   ! version information
00020   integer :: VERSION_MAJOR   = 0
00021   integer :: VERSION_MINOR   = 1
00022   integer :: VERSION_RELEASE = 1
00023 
00024   ! list all types
00025   type(particle_type)              :: neut
00026   type(material_type), allocatable :: mat(:)
00027   type(tally_type), allocatable    :: tal(:)
00028 
00029   ! list history input information
00030   integer :: nhistories
00031   integer :: seed
00032   integer :: source_type
00033 
00034   ! list global vars that are set during run
00035   integer :: eidx        ! energy index for cross sections
00036   integer :: n_tallies   ! number of tallies
00037   integer :: n_materials ! n_materials
00038   integer :: res_iso     ! resonant isotope id in material 1
00039   real(8) :: Dancoff     ! lattice Dancoff factor (C)
00040   real(8) :: radius      ! radius of fuel pin
00041 
00042   ! set max and min energy
00043   real(8) :: emin = 1e-11_8
00044   real(8) :: emax = 20.0_8
00045 
00046   ! kT value base on 300K
00047   real(8) :: kT = 8.6173324e-5_8*300*1.0e-6_8
00048 
00049   ! set nu value
00050   real(8) :: nubar = 2.455_8
00051 
00052   ! timers
00053   type(Timer) :: time_init
00054   type(Timer) :: time_run

00056   ! analog counters for k-inf
00057   integer :: n_abs=0.0_8

00059   real(8) :: ana_kinf_mean = 0.0_8

00067 ! ALLOCATE_PROBLEM
00070 
00071   subroutine allocate_problem()
00072 
00073     ! formal variables
00074 
00075     ! allocate tallies
00076     if (.not.allocated(tal)) allocate(tal(n_tallies))
00077     if (.not.allocated(mat)) allocate(mat(n_materials))
00078 
00079   end subroutine allocate_problem
00080 
00081 !===============================================================================
00082 ! DEALLOCATE_PROBLEM
00085 
00086   subroutine deallocate_problem()
00087 
00088     use materials, only: deallocate_material
00089     use tally,     only: deallocate_tally
00090 
00091     ! local variables
00092     integer :: i  ! loop counter
00093 
00094     ! deallocate within materials
00095     do i = 1,n_materials
00096 
00097       ! deallocate material
00098       call deallocate_material(mat(i))
00099 
00100     end do
00101 
00102     ! deallocate material variable
00103     if (allocated(mat)) deallocate(mat)
00104 
00105     ! deallocate within tallies
00106     do i = 1,n_tallies
00107 
00108       ! deallocate tally
00109       call deallocate_tally(tal(i))
00110 
00111     end do
00112 
00113     ! deallocate tally variable
00114     if (allocated(tal)) deallocate(tal)
00115 
00116   end subroutine deallocate_problem

00118 !===============================================================================
00119 ! COMPUTE_MACRO_CROSS_SECTIONS
00122 
00123   subroutine compute_macro_cross_sections()
00124 
00125     use materials, only: compute_macroxs
00126 
00127     ! local variables
00128     integer :: i  ! loop counter
00129 
00130     ! begin loop over materals
00131     do i = 1,n_materials
00132 
00133       ! call routine to compute xs
00134       call compute_macroxs(mat(i))
00135 
00136     end do
00137 
00138   end subroutine compute_macro_cross_sections
00139 
00140 !===============================================================================
00141 ! ADD_TO_TALLIES
00144 
00145   subroutine add_to_tallies()
00146 
00147     use tally, only: add_to_tally
00148 
00149     ! local variables
00150     integer :: i            ! loop counter
00151     real(8) :: fact = 1.0_8 ! multiplier factor
00152     real(8) :: totxs        ! total macroscopic xs of material
00153 
00154     ! compute macroscopic cross section
00155     totxs = sum(mat(neut%region)%totalxs(eidx,:))
00156 
00157     ! begin loop over tallies
00158     do i = 1,n_tallies
00159 
00160       ! set multiplier
00161       select case(tal(i)%react_type)
00162 
00163         ! flux only
00164         case(0)
00165           fact = 1.0_8
00166 
00167         ! total 
00168         case(1)
00169           fact = totxs
00170 
00171         ! absorption
00172         case(2)
00173           fact = sum(mat(neut%region)%absorxs(eidx,:))
00174 
00175         ! scattering
00176         case(3)
00177           fact = sum(mat(neut%region)%scattxs(eidx,:))
00178 
00179         ! nufission
00180         case(4)
00181           fact = nubar*sum(mat(neut%region)%fissixs(eidx,:))
00182 
00183         ! fission
00184         case(5)
00185           fact = sum(mat(neut%region)%fissixs(eidx,:))
00186 
00187         ! micro capture
00188         case(6)
00189           if (neut%region == tal(i)%region) then
00190             fact = mat(neut%region)%isotopes(tal(i)%isotope)%xs_capt(eidx)
00191           else
00192             cycle
00193           end if
00194 
00195         ! default is flux tally
00196         case DEFAULT
00197           fact = 1.0_8
00198 
00199       end select
00200 
00201       ! call routine to add tally
00202       call add_to_tally(tal(i),fact,totxs,neut%E,neut%region)
00203 
00204     end do
00205 
00206   end subroutine add_to_tallies
00207 
00208 !===============================================================================
00209 ! BANK_TALLIES
00212 
00213   subroutine bank_tallies()
00214 
00215     use tally, only: bank_tally
00216 
00217     ! local variables
00218     integer :: i  ! loop counter
00219 
00220     ! begin loop over tallies
00221     do i = 1,n_tallies
00222 
00223       ! call routine to bank tally
00224       call bank_tally(tal(i))
00225 
00226     end do
00227 
00228   end subroutine bank_tallies
00229 
00230 !===============================================================================
00231 ! FINALIZE_TALLIES
00234 
00235   subroutine finalize_tallies()
00236 
00237     use tally, only: calculate_statistics
00238 
00239     ! local variables
00240     integer :: i ! loop counter
00241     integer :: j ! loop counter
00242 
00243     ! begin loop over tallies
00244     do i = 1,n_tallies
00245 
00246       ! call routine to compute statistics
00247       call calculate_statistics(tal(i),nhistories)
00248 
00249       ! normalize by volumes and histories if flux tally
00250       if (tal(i)%flux_tally .or. tal(i)%dv) then
00251         do j = 1,n_materials
00252           tal(i)%mean(:,j) = tal(i)%mean(:,j) / mat(j)%vol
00253         end do
00254       end if
00255 
00256     end do
00257 
00258     ! compute k_inf
00259     ana_kinf_mean = dble(n_fiss)*nubar/dble(n_abs)
00260 !   ana_kinf_std  = sqrt((ana_kinf_mean/dble(n_) - ana_kinf_mean**2)/dble(n-1)) 
00261     ana_kinf_std  = 0.0_8
00262     col_kinf_mean = sum(tal(n_tallies)%mean)
00263     col_kinf_std  = sum(tal(n_tallies)%std)
00264 
00265   end subroutine finalize_tallies
00266 
00267 end module global
